oneof.quality: Code of Honor: Like a Boss

quality.name: Better to be Feared Than Loved
Merc
quality.notes: +3 die pool modifier when negotiating to sell/fence through this contact. Only suffer -1 on Ranged Combat Tests when Running. Increase Defense Test bonus from cover by +1.

quality.name: Trickshot
quality.notes: Do not halve WIL when determining the number of Take Aim actions you may take.

quality.name: Street Ninja
quality.notes: Cut Called Shot Penalties in half when attacking a Surprised target with melee or thrown weapons.

quality.name: Biosystem Overstress
quality.notes: Characters with this quality double the normal interval for Healing Tests and half the base period before Fatigue sets in.

quality.name: Buggy 'Ware
quality.notes: Reduce the number of 1â€™s needed to get a glitch by one per rating with selected ware.

quality.name: Mystery Mod Noise
quality.notes: +2 dice pool modifier to any Hearing Perception Tests made against the character, and a +1 when muted by heavy clothing.

quality.name: Assensing Rejection
quality.notes: Does not get the information from Assensing tests.

quality.name: Chronic Dissociation Syndrome
quality.notes: -3 to all Willpower tests except Spell and Damage Resistance. Addiction tests do take -3.

quality.name: Emotion Leak
quality.notes: -2 to all social tests when in person.

quality.name: Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder
quality.notes: -4 to Perception tests when not using Observe in Detail.

quality.name: Retirement Reward
quality.notes: An extra 50,000Â¥ for your character, chosen as a Voluntary Retirement reward by voluntarily retiring a character that met the requirements and selected the extra NuYen reward. Please see Player Rules for details. This quality is safe to remove after exiting chargen.
